work.title: Madac Schools
work: Network Manger

Deploy and program network systems in 2 buildings, ensuring seamless functionality
Develop a cloud-based monitoring system for all access points and overall network surveillance
Program a comprehensive storage server (cloud) with various associated services
Configure a Windows Server (AD DS) with multiple roles to meet organizational needs
Create and manage servers (VPN, Storage, Inventory of Technical  Assets, Web Server)
Systems administration (Google Workspace, Microsoft 365)
programming routers with load-balance and combine speeds to increase internet efficiency
Central management and steup IP phones
Configure cameras and connecting them to the network and remote control
Setup a portable audio system and connect it to the network and control it via mobile phone
Developing interactive screens and integrating the computer with it to become two in one
Providing technical support of all kinds and solving problems (hardware, software, network, printers, etc.)
Providing media material to the Information Technology Department, producing educational and promotional videos, and designing the logo and identity of the department
Equipping many computer laboratories (7 Labs)
